Articles.Content:
Like the title says, what should I do next? I've landed a colony on the Mun, and got a satellite into orbit of Minimus. I'm not sure what I should do next. Do you guys have any ideas? If you have any, please reply with the idea.

Edited October 28, 2015 by PineCone

Land on Minmus if you haven't done that yet.

Then land on Duna.

Happy landings!
If you are looking for direction, and you aren't doing it already, I would recommend you start a career mode game. Career mode leads you through with missions coming up as your experience increases.

Starhawk: Okay, I'll go land on Minimus. I probably won't do any interplanetary stuff soon.

Phil deCube: I don't really need direction, but thanks anyway.

Beatz0121: Nope.

Send an unmanned lander to Eve. The actual landing is pretty easy, since parachutes work great on Eve.

I say "unmanned" because although going there is easy, taking off is the hardest thing in the game. Don't send anything to Eve that you want to bring back, at least until you're a KSP expert.

It's one of the easiest interplanetary destinations in the game, and launch windows open fairly often.
